website_summaries.verdict: If you're in the market for a versatile, space-saving tie rack, this one is a winner.
pros: Consumers praise both the quality and functionality of this unique tie rack that stores ties upright but swivels out to make them accessible
It gets top marks for durability and keeping ties secure
It also has a space-saving design that we love
cons: Not ideal for men with a very large tie collection

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind it is great. It keeps items that don't have wrinkles free from it, but it didn't free the items that have wrinkles already. It holds a good amount of times and spoons pretty freely as well. My only complaint is that it doesn't display all my ties as visually appealing as some of the others, like the circle rack. When it gets moved from origin point; it gets set at a 45 degree angle versus a 90 degree which would keep the ties from hitting each other. It would probably remove more wrinkles that way and still be more appealing to the eyes
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best Tie Rack Out There!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I have ever purchased. PROS 1. Great space saver. 2. Beautiful form and design; functional and easy to use (I'm a minimalist) 3. Holds a lot of ties securely 4. Especially love the tilt function which allows you to nicely display your ties; also love the rotate function 5. Lightweight and sturdy construction 6. Excellent value for your money CONS 1. None I've owned more expensive and "fancier" tie racks with automatic rotation. They take up more room and provide no additional utility. This tie rack is simply and hands down 10x better! I HIGHLY recommend it for anyone who is anti-clutter and wants something useful with a clean look.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tram

customer_reviews.title: Great for ties and belts, not so much for scarves
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a scarf organizer, but in order to keep my scarves from falling out, I would have had to pinch them in and wrinkle my scarves. I gave it to my son, who has a growing collection of ties and belts, and he loves it (hence the 5 stars).
customer_reviews.author: desertdancer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for bow ties
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job ok. 4 stars for me. But the little clip things that you slide the ties onto dont actually hang onto bow ties very well at all. I have it in a place where it doesn't get bumped in my closet, I'm positive this would be a 3 star review if I had things situated in my closet differently because one small bump and your bow ties will slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Puddin

customer_reviews.title: Want to know how you can tell we liked this?  Read on....
customer_reviews.text: Second positive review....these are the the second two we've ordered....still like them (obviously) : Want to know how much we liked this? Just ordered two more!! Very nice. I would have given five stars....but....the only thing that could be improved...for me....is clearer instructions about how to work it (easy in the end!) and how it's actually supposed to look. Other than than....really nice for my husband's million (or so it seems!) time! Third positive review: And now we're ordering two more!! Caveat...however....it does not hold ties of very thin material, however. But most ties....absolutely
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this even though he didn't think he needed it! It frees up so much closet space for him and keeps his ties organized and free of wrinkles. I would highly recommend for any gentlemen in your life -- Great stocking stuffer!! ❤👍 Hope this helps! ❤ C.Hamilton
customer_reviews.author: C.Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: The best  tie hanger ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love the rack hanger! I had over 80 ties or one traditional hanger. My wife drove me to organize this in a better fashion and I saw your products on Amazon. I ordered two and put them into place and I also got rid of a lot of mai tais. Everything is so well organized now and it is more space for shirts and slacks. I even ordered a third rack hanger which really streamline my usage and access to all three of them.
customer_reviews.author: steve shrader

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious
customer_reviews.text: A nearly perfect design for storing/organizing ties. The hanger folds up to be the same size as my prior tie hangers, but when its open, all of my ties are displayed for simpler selection. At first glance, I thought the hanger was cheap and delicate. But, after using it for a week, I realized my initial impression was wrong. This seems sturdy and should be in my closet for years.
customer_reviews.author: HobbesEsq

customer_reviews.title: He quite liked it, but hated having to replace the batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband had owned a battery operated tie rack. He quite liked it, but hated having to replace the batteries every few months. He purchased 2 of these tie racks and found them to be exactly what he needed. He has a lot of ties and so we have ordered 2 more. The racks hold the ties in place and allow him to see each tie. He (is very organized) can keep ties organized by color and season, and find what he is looking for easily. The racks are not expensive, but the will probably last a while as they are not going to take a beating just being in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Intuitive and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Intuitive and easy to use, this is a very handy way to store a lot of ties. It takes up little space and keeps all ties easy to visualize for quick selection. The little clips keep the ties securely on the peg - so forget the frustration of going into the closet and finding your silk ties all slide to the floor. This is my second rack hanger - my wife keeps buying me ties, and I wouldn't use any other method to store them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this tie rack
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this tie rack, and simply does what it is supposed to do: organize my ties and make them easily accessible. One minor complaint, it makes 3/4 of the ties easily accessible, but a quarter of them will always need the rack to be turned to access them. Its shape makes it somewhat awkward to turn in a tight closet space. I've simply put the least favorite ties in the least favorable location. It replaced a cheaper "twirl-a-tie" rack that my wife bought me as a stocking stuffer at Christmas. After 7 months, the twirl a tie, started to disconnect the hanger from the twirling base off only the weight of 18 ties.
customer_reviews.author: DEC12345

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just got this opened up and loaded with ties - it seems like a sturdy item, and if it holds up under regular use, it will be a 5 star item. I like that it has this clip design that keeps the tie on the rack instead of sliding to the floor. And the hangar head swivels, making it easy to look thru the ties quickly.
customer_reviews.author: tiagina

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these about 6 months ago and have really liked using them. Very nice way to organize and store your ties. The tie clips hold the ties in there very well. The reason I went 4 stars instead of 5 is that after a couple uses, it becomes progressively harder to keep the two racks upright. They don't "click" in as well as they do at first, and end up resting in the "x" position instead of locking in upright to minimize the space they take up. It hasn't bothered me enough to merit a lower score though, I'd probably do 4.5/5 if possible.
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase, but slightly overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, it has a very solid feel and it does exactly as described; I have an assortment of ties in all shapes and sizes, all of them have fit on the hanger without any issues. It may be a bit overpriced for what it's made of, but it was worth the few extra dollars to get a solid tie hangar and from a company that stands by its products. I've gone through three cheap ones made by different companies, one from Amazon and two from Brick & Mortar stores.. they've all fallen apart; It's nice to have one that finally functions.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Saves valuable space
customer_reviews.text: Before I had this product I was wasting space in my closest by hanging my ties on a hanger. This consolidates all my ties and hangs them in a much smaller space. This product makes it very easy to see all my ties at once, enabling me to pick one that much faster. The packaging is nothing special, and seems to come straight from the manufacturer in China. Only downside for me is that the original price was right on the packaging, blatantly reminding me that I overpaid to a reseller. Other than that, does everything it needs to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T. Eadie

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. It is made of plastic, but, unlike some reviewers, I don't think it looks cheap at all. The clips that hold the ties in place work extremely well. The hanger that goes on the round hanger bar in your closet rotates, so this tie hanger takes up no more space than a pair of pants. You can even see and select your tie when it's closed if you're in a hurry. My boyfriend loves it. He put some ties I bought him on the tie rack and hung it off a tall dresser handle in our bedroom so he can look at it for a few days. Lol. :)
customer_reviews.author: STop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, trouble keeping locked in place
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product for the price, but once filled with ties we have had a little issue keeping the two sides locked in vertically. We used to keep all ties on a hanger and it was a mess but didn't take up to much room in the closet. This actually takes up a little more room because it wants to stay open but the ties are much more neat and organized. I purchased another tie holder and although I like it, I wish I would have bought another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: TiredParents

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small closet
customer_reviews.text: My husband has so many ties this works perfectly to hold them all in a small and compact closet such as ours. We love that this spins so he can see all the ties and can adjust each side as needed. My husband loves that there is a small clip above each little rod to hold the tie in place when spinning/moving it around-I don't find a pile of ties on the floor (and our cats laying on them) due to this little but huge detail. My husband definitely wants to buy more as his tie collection starts to grow
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: so good. Made of pretty solid plastic
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Made of pretty solid plastic. It holds 20 ties, which is more than what I have so far. I haven't had any issues with ties falling off. Keep in mind that you can only fold out each hanger one direction, otherwise you'll break it. The hanger rotates 360 degrees, so you can get a good look at all your ties. Nice to display all your ties and get a good look at your selection. I do wish it was velvet lined, to have an even better grip on the ties and to protect the delicate material some ties are made of. Overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Joses

customer_reviews.title: need a little space on clothes bar
customer_reviews.text: didn't care for both (bought two) at first, but with a little space to open it up and select ties, it's good. plastic looks a little cheap, but good price.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: A concern he had was that the clips were too tight and sometimes leave divots in thicker ties (however the upside to that is tha
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend. He uses it and likes it. A concern he had was that the clips were too tight and sometimes leave divots in thicker ties (however the upside to that is that ties don't slip out which is a plus to me) and my concern is that the plastic isn't of great quality. He still uses it and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daphlab

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Will buy more...
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of my husband's ties ending up everywhere. He probably has about 100, and he says they are all very important. So, at my wits end I scoured Amazon looking for a solution that would meet his needs. He wanted a display situation, easily accessible, and easy to put the ties away. This Tie Rack Organizer fits the bill. It is made of a strong plastic, easily shifts and turns so my husband can find what he's looking for, and when I put the ties away it takes seconds and not days (before I was rolling them into rolls and sticking them in a drawer). It hangs in the closet taking up very little room.
customer_reviews.author: J DeVisser

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: The tie rack is fine. It's rather limited in the number of ties that can be hung on it. And the plastic is not as sturdy as my metal hangers. I wouldn't purchase another of these, but if you one have a few ties this is probably an ok product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised but can feel cheap. I would recommend but just be careful not to be too rough with this item when adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Veraseth

customer_reviews.title: Space saving tie hanger
customer_reviews.text: This tie organizer is very practical even though it's almost $17. I do like the way I can hang a large number of ties vertically so that I have more space in my closet. I bought two about a year ago and i'm happy I did. I'm considering purchasing a third one because I have way too many ties. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it says
customer_reviews.text: Finally his 80+ ties are organized! Worked just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: AZam

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. The little top clips keep the ties from sliding off, which is an improvement over most tie racks on the market. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is I feel it was a little overpriced for a piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: C. Boles

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Collecting an assortment of ties over the years I thought it best to have a tie rack. This to me seemed the best option and it just met my expectations. The rack is made of very cheap plastic that can bend, but other than that, can hold a lot of ties and has a rotating hanger knob that is useful when you are putting it back in your closet.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bongiorno

customer_reviews.title: Clever product, works great
customer_reviews.text: This is really cool. I love the design. It holds many ties. It collapses to fit in small closet spaces but swings open when you need to see all ties on either side. I recommend this for anyone who likes organization and has limited space in the closet for ties.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner, folks!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES it! We are likely going to buy another in the near future as he filled this one to capacity with what he already had and since he definitely intends to add to his wardrobe. I would add a photo but it looks exactly like the existing one and I'm at the library :P Suggestion: This product could possibly be improved by adding more "shelves" above the existing ones for smaller items like bow-ties.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just as described. Save's space in the closet, especially if you don't have a lot of closet space.
customer_reviews.author: K. Young

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Robust
customer_reviews.text: I was initially skeptical about how robust the arm rotation mechanism would be given the low price and plastic construction. I was pleasantly surprised that it clicks into place in the vertical and diagonal positions, and seems more then capable of remaining there under the weight of silk ties. Overall a great hanging tie organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Mazeofthemind

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, doing exactly what I needed it to do
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, doing exactly what I needed it to do. Doesn't necessarily seem super crazy sturdy but it is plastic so you get what you pay for. Hasn't bent or broke and we are at atleast 50% full and it looks to be holding up just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, Practical, and Ideal!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these necktie hangers after seeing them on amazon. I've had a need for quite some time to replace my old necktie hangers because they were cumbersome, took up too much space on the bar and were starting to rip some of my ties. These new hangers from aristocrats are perfect for my needs! The plastic structure is both durable and easy on the ties. A pleasant surprise is the little clip on each tie bar that ensures that each individual tie does not slide out...this is ideal! The swivel hook is also a nice touch. I enjoyed the first one so much, I bought a second!...this is a must have for anyone that has ties in their wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: This is made of thin plastic and I wonder how long it will last
customer_reviews.text: This is made of thin plastic and I wonder how long it will last . It's not what I expected though at the price I should have suspected that.
customer_reviews.author: rainzapp

customer_reviews.title: Good design, does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: At a previous house I had a nice wood and brass tie holder but I needed something for my new place. I like this more than the fancier mountable tie racks. Even though it is on a hanger, it balances perfectly and the design makes it easier to see each tie. With the previous tie rack I would sometimes even forget I had a certain tie because they weren't as visible. There's nothing fancy about this, but it does exactly what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest! Great Father's Day Gift for the hubby! It was super easy to just take out of the package and slide on the ties. There was no confusing assembly process, it came out of the package ready to hang. I was pleasantly surprised. It hangs 20 ties and can turn it sideways to fit easily into closet. Also came in on time, no problems with shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Is A Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The rack came right away and is working well so far. A nice follow up email came too with a recommendation of a website on how to pick and care for ties - thanks! Update: I've had these guys for years, and they work great! They store lots of ties in a small space, and you can see them and get them out easily when you want.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Menkes

customer_reviews.title: It does the job of keeping the ties nice and organized and using the least possible amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: A very well designed Tie Organizer; it really shows how much the manufacturer paid attention to detail. It does the job of keeping the ties nice and organized and using the least possible amount of space; not to mention how easy is to get the ties out and put them back. An A+ in design. I'm a retired Mechanical Engineer with an eye for well designed items :)
customer_reviews.author: GHGarzon

customer_reviews.title: Useful, simple, sleek, functional; a better solution than comparable others.
customer_reviews.text: As described. Well designed and functional. Slightly flimsier than expected, but really nothing out of the ordinary. I had been using a different, metal hanger with multiple racks in the hanger for holding ties; but this one functions a lot better with the swivel body and racks that can move from a storage position to a more-like display position for quickly identifying and choosing a tie. Will definitely be getting another when I fill up all the arms on this first one.
customer_reviews.author: NBC

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. I bought 5 altogether after trying out 1 to see how it would do. The only thing I would have liked is if the tie holder would stay clicked in place in the upright position. But so far it's been the best space saving product, super easy to put the ties back in place, and great for displaying my husband's ties when Trying to pick one out.
customer_reviews.author: tess devin

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE TIES ON THE FLOOR!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband dresses in suit and tie everyday for work so I feel like he has about a million ties. I love this tie hanger so far. I'm upgrading from another tie hanger that was leaving too many ties on the floor- There is nothing worse than the moment you realize you hit the tie rack hanger wrong and all the ties fall to the floor. I love this one because it holds the ties securely and it folds up so it takes up little room. So far NO TIES ON THE FLOOR!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie D Lund

customer_reviews.title: Tie Rack Hanger
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and they are holding all of my ties neatly and compactly. I truly love them.
customer_reviews.author: Walter P Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Keeps ties in place well and takes up ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Keeps ties in place well and takes up minimal space. The angles are a little funky, but for twice a day use this thing is way underpriced for the value
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Velissaris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great tie organizer takes up very little room in our closet when my boyfriend decides to not leave his ties on the floor lol!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design!
customer_reviews.text: With the 30+ ties I have, I needed a good way to organize all of them. Having a drawer full of them was just messy. Creating small square compartments in my drawer for each individual tie didn't work either since I have too many ties. This gives me not only the organization I need but the essential VISIBILITY of ALL my ties!
customer_reviews.author: NunezJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It does everything it should and I would recommend to others. I need a more stationary tie rack for my personal needs, but could not find one that fits in my closet. This tie rack is great because of the clips. Ties are well attached and don't fall off. Its a bit smaller than I expected and flimsier, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 ties/side is a good balance, any more could be a hassle
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, folds up when done selecting your tie, be sure to pay attention to the arrows, so you don't break it. Only suggestion is to fill in the embossed arrow with a light color, so you can see the arrows in a dark closet. The rotating hook is mandatory, wouldn't buy it without one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Don't Be That Guy!
customer_reviews.text: I used to drape my ties over an old pants hanger from a department store. That sucked, often leaving my ties on the floor of my closet. Now, thanks to the Tie Rack Hanger from Aristocrat, my ties are neatly and compactly stored in my closet. Are you hanging your ties on an old pants hanger from a department store? Stop that! Don't be that guy!
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to visualize
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 of these things. I've been through a number of tie racks in the past (e.g. long, wooden/metal racks). This tie rack is Compact, Easy to visualize, and holds the ties with a clip so they don't fall. It's the best tie rack I've ever had. I also bought my father one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice tie hanger
customer_reviews.text: Took me a minute to figure out how to face the ties on the hanger but it really looks nice. Think I will order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A. Waller

customer_reviews.title: It works great. Only one thing should be improved
customer_reviews.text: It's a uniquely designed product. I recently re-organized my closet. My old tie hanger takes too much space. So I searched on Amazon and bought this tie hanger. It works great. Only one thing should be improved: this is a plastic molded part, on some of the hanging shafts, there are tiny burrs on them. That could easily scratch the delicate silk fabricate. So I hope the manufacturer do a thorough inspection on each hanging shaft to make sure every surface that touches the tie must be very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Gimmicky But Useful Anyway
customer_reviews.text: Although it seems a little "gimmicky" in use, having to swing the arms out to access a tie, the rack does work well and certainly better than hanging all of the ties over an old clothes hanger
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Organizes but feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and hold the ties well. That said, these aren't the most durable. I filled every tie slot and it simply doesn't stay "up" anymore. It's always in the X shape. If this is supposed to happen, I'll adjust my rating - but it seems like the little connection pieces at the top just wore out way too fast.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Needed this item for a long time and happy I finally got it
customer_reviews.text: Needed this item for a long time and happy I finally got it. Saves a lot o space and properly organizes my ties. I need another, i didnt realise I had so many ties.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty Royal

customer_reviews.title: It functions great, as it is very easy to spin and ...
customer_reviews.text: The appearance is the only worry I had before purchasing this product. It functions great, as it is very easy to spin and lock in/out when handling ties. The hangers don't seem to wrinkle my ties and are just the right size where the ties are all held securely in place (not too tight, not too loose). After purchasing this product, the appearance is no longer an issue for me. It hangs in my closet so I am the only one that views/uses it and it functions so well for the price that I really can't complain about the looks. I am very glad that I chose this tie hanger!
customer_reviews.author: Cole Reedy

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I look forward to giving this a Christmas present to one of our friends this year....he is a High School Math teacher who wears a tie to school every day. The easy organization of this unit should definitely help make his tie selection easier than ever! Arrived is perfect condition and in good time, too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jay

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tie rack for my hubby for Christmas. It looks and feels flimsy, but is actually really nice. He was able to get almost all of his ties on the rack (he has a lot of ties!). Now they are easy to access and take up little room. The service was fast and the company was great to work with.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: This tie rack hanger works perfect for keeping your ties organized
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few ties, and I got so sick of them falling on the closet floor. This tie rack hanger works perfect for keeping your ties organized!
customer_reviews.author: EduStud

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely in closet
customer_reviews.text: Holds ties in place. Don' use the foldout functionality much but its better than not having the option to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Grahaminator

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price, would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they do exactly what you want them to do. They are definitely plastic, but not overly flimsy. As long as you are relatively gentle with them, you won't have any issues. I have maxed out 2 of these and will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Compact Tie Hangar saves space while accommodating a great bunch of ties
customer_reviews.text: The Compact Tie Hangar saves space while accommodating a great bunch of ties. The instructions state that the apparatus should be opened in the direction of the arrow. I looked all over the Tie rack but could not discern arrows for opening, but I was able to open it without a lot of force which would break the tie rack.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't hold that well, ties keep falling off the rack
customer_reviews.author: LolVS

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, great tie rack for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use, and should work with any kind of closet rack. Now I just need to see if it has enough space for all my ties! I'll be getting a new one if not. (-;
customer_reviews.author: Trey Blancher

customer_reviews.title: Gaggle of Ties
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. It display bows and regulars fairly well, and it works better than the one I had. It doesn't hold all of them from falling off, hence four stars instead of five. The best aspect is that it is compact for the number of ties it holds. I may get another as the collection grows. Hanger was packed well and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: fourbyfive

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - If you have more than 10 ties Buy this Organizer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one 2 weeks ago and then just got my 2nd one in the mail 2 days ago. It is a simple but useful product. It organizes your ties and really allows you to see each one individually. This is probably the best feature that you can really see the colors and all of the ties to choose from... It also does not take up much space. Much better than the kind you mount on a wall or the hanger that goes straight across. Can hold 20 ties. I color coordinated them in my closet. The tie organizer is made from plastic. I would recommend to any one who has more than 10 ties...
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Nice space saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a real space saver in the closet compared to the typical individual clips that come with ties when they're bought. Its relatively sturdy. Although, it does need to be treated gently when removing ties. Its better for those who don't typically rush in grabbing a tie on the way out of the door.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rice

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have lots of ties
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best tie hangers I have used. It holds the tie in place well when I am moving the arms from upright to horizontal. Definitely helps with reducing space required - size could have been a bit bigger, but still good.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.O

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loves it! I have bought 2 and ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it! I have bought 2 and will probably order more. He really loves that this tie rack gives him the opportunity to see all the ties at the same time while in other tie racks some of the ties are covered among them. It seems strong.
customer_reviews.author: Flower6

customer_reviews.title: Great- we ordered two more!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this tie rack so much we ordered two more. His ties always fall off other tie racks but this one has a clip to hold every tie in place. The tie rack does hold 20 ties but my husband will not get put away old ties so he likes to hang them all up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tie hanger. Hold ties perfectly and very versitle. You can have it setup a few different ways. For the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rob

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tie rack for my husband. He also hangs his belts from here too because he likes the Mission Belts that do not have a true buckle like other belts. This works perfectly because it can handle both.
customer_reviews.author: PennyLaneAtticus

customer_reviews.title: Any guy who own ties, should have this!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty slick (ties do not slip),well made tie storage hanger organizer, takes up minimal space but display ties nicely. Bought 2 because I have more than 20 ties,may get at least another. Thinking the belt rack hanger would be good too. Thank you Aristocrat housewares!
customer_reviews.author: Mikertv

customer_reviews.title: Great little organizer for your neck ties!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this while cleaning out and organizing our closet. Items is exactly as expected, and works great. After placing all the ties on the rack, both ends fold back up and keep your ties organized in the space of just one hanger! Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Nick M

customer_reviews.title: An excellent, efficient
customer_reviews.text: An excellent, efficient, and cost-effective innovation. This compact and easily accessible tie rack holds twenty ties, and is an excellent alternative to the automated Sharper Image tie rack that I previously owned, which was very expensive, bulky, and difficult to maneuver. I am going to stay with this product for future tie rack purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Holds 20 ties. I currently have it all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds 20 ties. I currently have it all the way full and it's done its job. Doesn't take up too much space in a closet, but it can be deceivingly heavy depending on the type of ties you have. Haven't had any problem with it yet
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Arranges and holds neckties secure; easy rotate; well articulated accessory; closet looks tidier instantly with all my husband's ties neatly arrayed. Would recommend this without a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: Shilpz

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Compact, and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I had an unfortunate mess of ties hanging in my closet, causing me to waste time searching for the tie I wanted, and in some cases, wrinkling ties that were improperly stored. This tie hanger arrived and made it super easy to organize many ties in a compact space, I can easily see them all, and it's quick to add/remove ties. The materials all feel super high quality and I'll expect to have this (maybe two!) for a long time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It works out so well. My husband has over 80 ties and I needed a way to organize them and keep them neat. I ordered two of these tie racks and they worked out so well for half of his ties I ordered two more for the rest. The clips hold each tie just fine. I was able to organize the ties by color. I usually don't do reviews but I liked the tie racks so much and they solve my problem wonderfully that I decided to do the review. Wonderful product. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH BENTO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Ties stay securely in the hanger, won't slide off. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I have had all sorts of tie racks before. This one is simple, saves space, and the ties don't fall off. I will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Notarugulamom

customer_reviews.title: The quality and durability is great. It doesn't take up much space in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have most of my ties hung and I am about to purchase another tie rack. The quality and durability is great. It doesn't take up much space in the closet. The tie holder rotes making it easier to grab your tie or even position the tie holder to take up less space in closet. The cost was a good price which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived within two days and I promptly ordered another one. It works beautifully. It takes up almost no space and it's hard to believe that within a few inches on the closet pole there are 40 ties stored neatly and easy to access! My husband is thrilled and now has no excuse for a messy pile of ties.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. Cheap plastic. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy at all. It's made entirely of cheap plastic. Probably cost the seller all of 50 cents to have it made in China. Don't waste your money. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and effective space saving tie rack. Great for a small closet and a limited number of ties, it could also be good for travel as it folds open and closed. It seems to be of sold construction if not a little cheap looking. Overall great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ProfessorNinja

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Not a cheap plastic hanger
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Not a cheap plastic hanger. And I'm not afraid it will snap when I try to rotate it. Already full up so I will have to get another. Also, though I did not need to contact, the seller was great at assuring my satisfaction. Arrived in good time.
customer_reviews.author: Wedge3163

customer_reviews.title: Saved my husband's disorganization!!!
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived quickly and is perfect for what we needed! We have a small apartment and my husband was taking over the whole room by trying to hang or lay his ties all over so he could see them. This hanger is compact and keeps the ties from falling on the floor. It saves so much space AND you can still see all the ties. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Takes up minimal space and holds my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Takes up minimal space and holds my husbands ties wonderfully. We have two of these now, as my husband really likes it. It doesn't create creases in the ties and works in small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works as advertised! I absolutely love the design...not bulky, and it swivels at the neck of the hook so you you don't have to remove the whole thing from the bar. Each tie is also held on by a clip to prevent it from sliding off. IMHO, the only way this product could be improved is to add slots for more ties. I liked it so much that I ordered another one for myself, and one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Antionne L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended if you need a tie rack
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is I wish it held more ties! This tie rack is something you'd expect to be overpriced at retail stores, but Amazon and Aristocrat Homewares made a great product affordable for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is handy for ties, even bow ties. Makes it easy to swivel and pick the you're you want, andit doesn't take up too much closet space. Well packaged and arrived when promised.
customer_reviews.author: le moindre

customer_reviews.title: Great Simple Tie Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this simple tie holder. It holds twenty ties easily. I have not had to pick up one tie from the floor since using, unlike the hanger I was using prior to buying this tie rack. My husband was also impressed with it and finds it easy to pull a tie off and put it back when he is finished wearing his tie. It stores easily and takes up little space which is just what we needed for our small, shared closet. I would recommend this product because it gets the job done at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: I read the product reviews and people have loved this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really neat system for your ties. I was looking for a dresser top model but had to settle with this. I read the product reviews and people have loved this product! I just set it up and it is very simple. The plastic seems sturdy. I decided to put all 10 of my ties on one side, so obviously it looks just a bit tilted. But it seems to be standing up well! I had tie individual tie hangars before which were too tight on the ties and left marks. This system is gentle on your ties.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Randall

customer_reviews.title: This looks like a piece of junk however so far we love ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a piece of junk however so far we love it! I love it because it holds 20 ties and so far those 20 ties have remained on the tie rack and have not ended up on the floor. My husband loves it because it is easy to use. It it continues to work well I will buy a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: Jiveturkey1

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Review means I love it! And I do
customer_reviews.text: 5 Star Review means I love it! And I do! It's very easy to use. My husband has both free-style bow ties and long ties and it holds both styles securely. The full selection of ties on it are easy to see. I like the rack so much that I just ordered a second one to hold the rest of his ties and to replace his old style tie rack. It's better than the ones we purchased with our California Closet system. Even though it is made with plastic, it is sturdy. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: kathykangaroo

customer_reviews.title: Great tie organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love that it organizes the ties so you can see them all and not overlapping like other organizers. And you can fold it together and the ties are still protected from wrinkles. Was a little concerned reading some of the reviews about it being cheap plastic, but it works very well and the little clip holds the ties in perfectly. This has helped organize my husband's closet!
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for husband's ties.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think husband would care for this. But, I bought two of them needing some kind of solution. He love them. I transferred all his ties onto two of them and they hang with his shirts. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: oribhabor

customer_reviews.title: Using to hang tees
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy for my purpose which is as a hanger for small tanks/camisoles. I was able to get so many shirts on this hanger in less space. Company sent order very quickly, will buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Warnberg

customer_reviews.title: The Rack Hanger is a useful product. Clips hold the ties in place so ...
customer_reviews.text: The Rack Hanger is a useful product. Clips hold the ties in place so they don't slide off. The hook spins around and atriculates forward and back to make it easy to reach the ties. This tie rack is lightweight, takes up very little space and appears to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Perez

customer_reviews.title: low cost and made out of sturdy materials.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this tie organizer! All his ties are in one place and they stay in place, no more slipping or sloppy positions.He uses his old one for belts.Shipped fast, low cost and made out of sturdy materials.
customer_reviews.author: B4Me

product_meta.title: Tie Rack Hanger - the Original Necktie Cross Hanger from Aristocrat - 20 Tie Holders - Tie Rack Hanger with Criss-Cross Design – Closet Organizer
feature_bullets: High quality tie rack: 20 non slip clips, easily accessible and balanced in your wardrobe. The clips will not distinguish between materials
Versatile and applicable everywhere: Simply hang it in your closet like a coat hanger. The tie holder can be used for chains, scarfs, sashes
Long lasting: This closet organizer is made of a robust hard plastic of the highest quality. The Construction of the tie ensures it's longevity
Value for money: It's practical and versatile, it will last you a life time as it's made of durable plastics and costs less than what it would hold

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,714 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
